snippet: Gold, often seen as a hedge against inflation and a weak dollar, slumped to its lowest price in five years on Monday.
abstract: Price of gold drops to lowest price in five years, at $1,106.70 per ounce.
lead_paragraph: Gold, often seen as a hedge against inflation and a weak dollar, slumped to its lowest price in five years on Monday.

headline.main: Gold Falls to Lowest Price in Five Years: $1,106
headline.print_headline: Gold Falls to Lowest Price in Five Years: $1,106
